title: ➽Chic Somerville 4 Bedroom 2 Bathroom Available Now! Pet-Friendly!
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 301107678', 'Rent: $4,700 / Month', 'Beds: 4', 'Bath: 2', 'Available Date: 08/01/2022', 'Pet: Pet Friendly', 'Parking:: street parking', 'Chic Somerville 4 Bedroom 2 Bathroom Featuring Hardwood Floors, Central Air/Heat, a Private Deck, Modern Appliances, Fantastic Natural Light, High Ceilings, Good Closet Space, a Great Layout, a Microwave/Dishwasher, and an In-Unit Washer/Dryer.', 'Right in the Beautiful Somerville near Assembly Square, Target, Encore, Bus Lines, and Many Fantastic Bars/Restaurants!', 'Pet Friendly!', 'Video Tour Available!', 'Available Now!', 'Contact me via email!', 'Crew Fitzpatrick', 'CFB Real Estate powered by Keller Williams', 'Rentals @ CFBRealestate .', 'com', "Move in Costs: First Month's Rent, and Broker Fee (No Security Deposit or Last Month's Rent Upfront)!", 'Thanks for checking out my listing.', "I would love to work with you and find you a fantastic apartment, I offer Boston's largest personalized video database for ease of access!", 'To confirm availability for this unit and to see other great available listings please email me!', 'Bus: 85 Summer St @ Wesley Park (0.45 mi)', 'Bus: 91 Washington St @ Tufts St (0.20 mi)', 'Bus: 87 Somerville Ave @ Merriam St (0.38 mi)', 'Bus: 80 Cross St @ Fountain Ave (0.02 mi)', 'Tram: E Union Square (0.50 mi)', 'Bus: CT2 30 Prospect St (0.44 mi)', 'Bus: 86 Washington St @ Tufts St (0.20 mi)', 'Bus: 88 422 McGrath Hwy (0.11 mi)', 'Bus: 90 Cross St @ Fountain Ave (0.02 mi)', 'Bus: 101 Broadway @', 'Cross St (0.39 mi)', 'Bus: 95 Mystic Ave @ Plaza Entrance - Home Depot (0.61 mi)']
